profileSummary: 10+ years of experience building scalable, cloud-native, and high-performance solutions using modern technologies. Strong background in software architecture with hands-on expertise in microservices, CI/CD automation, databases, and secure system design. Proven experience delivering enterprise solutions and optimizing large-scale applications.

workExperience.title: Software Architect
responsibilities: Led full-stack engineering across multiple technology stacks.

Built 10+ automation tools improving team productivity by 40%.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for continuous delivery.
achievements: Scaled cloud platform to support 500K+ daily active users.
Reduced deployment time by 60% through automation.
Introduced monitoring tools improving system reliability by 35%.
workExperience.techStack: Angular, .NET Core, Python, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions

responsibilities: Developed centralized authentication modules across applications.
